name: Hedge Wizard
description:
Battle waves of bugs as the Hedge Wizard in this lane defense game! Use your spells to defend against these nasty bugs before they get you! 

Thanks for checking out my game! It's not much but it is one of the first games I've brought to completion. 

Controls: mouse and esc key

I built it in Unity using Bolt visual scripting. I was mostly just trying to learn so the game is pretty short. Only about 30ish minutes of play time. 

If you find any bugs let me know.
